question: Which nation's political identity is "Zhonghua minzu"?
explanation: Zhonghua minzu is a political concept associated with Chinese nationalism which covers nation-building, ethnicity and race in the Chinese nationality. Zhonghua minzu includes the Han Chinese and 55 other ethnic groups as a huge one-China family. It promotes one multi-ethnic Chinese nation-state with one single Chinese national identity. Liang Qichao puts forward the Zhonghua minzu (the Chinese nation).
